snippet: Robert Greenblatt told reporters about his thinking as he faces hard choices on what shows to extend on the network. The fall, he said, was "worse than I hoped for, but about what I expected."
abstract: Robert Greenblatt told reporters about his thinking as he faces hard choices on what shows to extend on the network. The fall, he said, was "worse than I hoped for, but about what I expected."

headline.main: NBC Entertainment Head Weighs In on 'Community,' '30 Rock' and 'House'
